EmailTemplate.name: IITB Candidature Sponsorship Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: IITB Candidature Sponsorship Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sheryl,
This is to notify you that the following IITB student/s have been approved enrolment or enrolment extension/s into the Joint IITB/Monash PhD. Could you please ensure that the student/s are not charged fees
Student ID / Name / Department / Faculty
Kind regards,
{!User.FirstName}
Graduate Research Services _____________________________________________ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D, 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia Phone: +61 3 990 53009 | Fax: +61 3 990 55042 Email: mge-candidature@monash.edu Website: monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
